sub_title: Product Innovation & Project leadership @ Ambit Solutions
summary:
I like to help entrepreneurs and product development teams with the growth of products and services. I'm happy to match with your ambitions and together increase the chance of success with the right mindset and approach. Your company is changing, you have plenty of innovative ideas and you aim for positive results for your customer or user. You know that innovative capacity is a necessity in order to permanently connect with your target group in a competitive market. 

But how do you handle it? 

Ambit Solutions helps you on your way from an early idea to a successful launch with carefully developed concepts. With creativity, fun in the process and empathy for the user to a successful launch of your product idea! 

I am an experienced Product Manager with a demonstrated history of working in product development teams within different industries. I am Skilled in Software Development, Product Development & Management, Product Design, Sustainability, Supply chain Management and Engineering. If we start a collaboration you will get to know a strong product management professional with a Master's Degree focused in Integrated Product Design from Faculty of Industrial Design Engineering, Delft University of Technology.

My ideal client is a start-up, scale-up or an R&D department with an innovative concept or idea that needs further elaboration. I have been working for the past 10 years in product development projects. Starting from my education, throughout my first job and currently I am offering my services through my own company. I have provided my services to YWAM, Royal IHC, Trimble, Hiber, SWKgroep and ZHL (Zuid-Hollands Landschap) among others. I appreciate long-term collaborative relationships for the best possible value exchange. 

Furthermore, I am a classic car enthusiast and a family person and I like sports, traveling and good food! 

If you want to know more about me please visit my website www.ambit.nl or write me an email at thijs@ambit.nl

Design Engineer | Product Manager | Product Owner | Concept Designer | Consultancy | Innovation Manager | Concept & Business Developer

treasury_media.description: Jouw partner in productontwikkeling. Ambit helpt je op jouw weg van pril idee naar succesvolle lancering met zorgvuldig uitgewerkte concepten.

treasury_media.title: About me
treasury_media.description: Ambit staat voor vergroten van levensgemak, plezier en resultaat. Dit bereiken we door de verbinding die ik maak, samen met jou als ondernemer én met gevoel voor de eindgebruiker. Ambitie en bereik is wat Ambit...

projects.title: 'The humanure carrousel' concept: a biogas sanitation system for Kenyan boarding schools
projects.description: Final master's study project for company SimGas consisting of 5 weeks fieldwork in Kenya, analysis of biogas sanitation and design of a biogas toilet system for Kenyan boarding schools.

contributors.headline: Product Innovation & Project leadership @ Ambit Solutions

projects.title: India Base of the Pyramid Cold Chain Project
projects.description: Study project in Base of the Pyramid context in West-Bengal, India, around the Cold Chain. Done for Enviu, a dutch organization and ONergy, an Indian organization. Project will be continued with 4 pilot-projects of cooling centers in local Indian communities. Project involved design of the cooling centers and the business model, field research in west-bengal, setting-up website, blogging and  promotion animation.

contributors.headline: Product Innovation & Project leadership @ Ambit Solutions
Software & Product Engineer | @Sevi - Impactful Value Chain Finance

projects.title: 4-D Sports field
projects.description: Study project enfolded around a revolvable sportsfield, making 1 area ready for multifunctional purposes. Done for Sublean and Cablean Engineering. Project will be continued to be developed in a prototype at Innosport Eindhoven. Project involved design of construction and the multiple surfaces: artificial turf, pulastic and solar panels.

contributors.headline: Product Innovation & Project leadership @ Ambit Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Ambit Solutions helps entrepreneurs and teams with the growth of products and services. We offer team coaching, innovation consultancy, design engineering, project/product management & procurement services. 

Our ideal client is a start-up, scale-up or an R&D department with an innovative concept or idea that needs further elaboration. We appreciate team work with a long-term oriented, collaborative relationship for the best possible value exchange.

Recent projects:

10-2022 ~ Current 
Handicare B.V.: Stairlift innovation projects in the UK & NL
~ Stairlift portfolio improvement projects 
~ Leading all departmental stakeholders to successful launch of new features. 

09-2018 ~ Current 
SWKgroep B.V.: HVAC-system revisions
~ Ventilation improvement project for daycare facilities
~ Leading all stakeholders to succesful integration of the new ventilation system in the field from contractor, daycare location managers to HVAC system engineering consultants. 

03-2020 ~ 05-2022 
Hiber B.V.: Concept design & procurement EasyPulse
~ Concept design enclosures and mounting solutions
~ Managing team dependencies with engineers
~ Managing production series of 200 pieces

06-2021 ~ 03-2022 
Stichting Zuid-Hollands Landschap (ZHL): Research & Analysis
~ Internal and external research facilities & tools volunteers
~ Designing strategies for showing appreciation to employees & volunteers based on the 5 languages of appreciation in the workplace
profile_positions.title: Innovation & Project Lead

profile_positions.description: Optahome represents a portfolio of residence designs. It is made up with a flexible wood construction system suitable for permanent and temporary living. It is characterized by an outstanding living experience in a relatively small area! Tiny villas!

profile_positions.description:
Product owner role for the software product Stabicad. 

Main tasks: designing visions and roadmaps for the software functionality, designing user interfaces, constructing workflow and user scenarios with customers, managing team interdependencies, SCRUM & backlog management for the Romanian software engineering team, facilitating the development process from concept to release.

profile_positions.description:
Volunteering on a medical ship in the rural areas of Papua New Guinea. 

Main tasks: partnering with a ship bringing hope to forgotten areas by giving healthcare, dental care, glasses and eye care to remote villages. All kinds of practical/ supporting work for the medical experts in the healthcare clinics to keep them running efficiently.

In between Bachelor and Master.

profile_positions.title: Product Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
A part-time chairman function in the 2009-2010 board of this foundation. Students 4 Sustainability; a foundation with clear goals for and by students of the TUDelft.

The Students 4 Sustainability Foundation was founded on February 28, 2007 with one clear goal: 'investing in sustainable technology in developing countries. This is practically spoken divided in two parts: the promotion of sustainability as a cool lifestyle in Delft and the promotion of investments in sustainable technology projects in developing countries done by students of the TUDelft.'
profile_positions.title: Chairman
